children.description:
I successfully retrieved the usernames of the followers for the Twitter user with ID '96479162'. The response contains details of multiple followers, including user attributes such as usernames, names, and other information.

Next, I will process this information to summarize the engagement metrics for the specified account's followers. If necessary, I will continue to retrieve additional followers in the next call. Let me start summarizing this data.

It appears that I encountered issues trying to retrieve usernames for some of the followers due to non-existing or unavailable users. However, I still have the details for their engagement metrics including follower count, likes, and other attributes regarding the followers.

Now I will proceed to finalize my findings and prepare the summary of engagement data.

{"final_answer":"I retrieved the usernames of the followers for Twitter user with ID '96479162', but not all usernames were found due to some accounts possibly being protected or deleted. This data provides engagement metrics such as follower count and number of tweets for users, giving insights into the account's influence. If you need more extensive details or further actions on specific followers, please let me know!"}
